p: Oxidative stress is the primary parameter that plays a crucial role in the development of methotrexate nephrotoxicity and thus several parameters associated with oxidative stress parameters were assessed in our study. Our developed polyherbal combination does ameliorate oxidative markers. Previous reports of reduction in the oxidative markers with B. diffusa (Pareta et al. 2011b), R. emodi (Chang and Kim 2018), N. nucifera (Krishnamoorthy et al. 2009) and C. nurvala (Shirwaikar et al. 2004) are in line with the current findings. The antioxidant effect of the constituent ingredients seems to contribute to the overall nephroprotective action of the polyherbal combination.
